subject: Hey, did you know you have an invoice that has been unpaid for a while?
body: Maybe it was just a test or something, but we thought you should know about it in case youwere waiting to get paid.You can manage your paid and unpaid invoices in the “Invoices” tab at Admin.Anypay.Global.Click on any of the past invoices there to see them and get their URL to send to your customers.They will see instant confirmation when you paid and you will get coins in your digital wallet.Cool.
